Title: DeMarcus Cousins released by Rockets; is he a fit for Boston?
Description: The Houston Rockets decided to do DeMarcus Cousins a solid and release the veteran big man so he can find a new home with a contender, per the Athletic’s Shams Charania. They even guaranteed his salary as a way to thank him for his professionalism while with the Rockets this season,
Author: Yahoo! Sports
